game_description: RETHINK harnesses the power of human connection to bring creatives, thinkers and innovators together to get work done. Designed to unleash creative ideas, enable flow state & reduce time to iteration, RETHINK supercharges creative collaboration, brainstorms, workshops, presentations, and product reviews. Persistent spaces. Share creative, collaborate, and capture feedback with on and off-site teams and clients. Immersive ideation and design thinking tools enabling hyperfocus and flow state.
review_1: This is a great app for collaboration and creative brainstorming with your team. I’ve used plenty of social and collaborative spaces but the team at rethink has designed spaces with easy-to-follow instructions to help with design sessions. Can’t wait to see what they’re adding next!
review_2: Great first release and beyond expectation for an Early Access Alpha!
review_3: The perfect application for creating an art gallery of my portfolio and inviting people to look at it.
